PHRASE.LANG: Hand-made by the finest artisans in the world (well, the finest that $5/hour can buy), and using the finest silk that can only be found in the mountains overlooking Nebraska, the 'PS Nation' shirt will tell anyone that sees it that "hey, I might have lost a bet." Trophies Yo!

Fabriqué à la main par des artisans de grand talent (enfin, de talent suffisant pour accepter d'être payés 5$ de l'heure) et tissé avec une soie d'une finesse incomparable, le t-shirt PS Nation vous permettra de faire savoir aisément à tout le monde que vous avez récemment perdu un pari. Trophies Yo!

Hand-made by the finest artisans in the world (well, the finest that $5/hour can buy), and using the finest silk that can only be found in the mountains overlooking Nebraska, the 'PS Nation' shirt will tell anyone that sees it that "hey, I might have lost a bet." Trophies Yo!
